Frighten a creature: it will be easier to hit and cannot move.

Dissonant Whispers is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dissonant Whispers is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
